scripts.start: node -e "console.log('open browser at http://localhost:8081/index.html\n\n');" && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js start
scripts.gh-pages: git branch -D gh-pages && git checkout -b gh-pages && rm .gitignore && yarn && yarn bundle && rm -rf node_modules && cp -r static_assets build/static_assets && git add --all && git commit --no-verify -m 'chore: gh-pages' && git push origin gh-pages -f && git checkout master && yarn
